job.title: People Data and Process Analyst - Excellence
job.description: strongJob TitlebrbrstrongPeople Data and Process Analyst  ExcellencebrbrstronguJob Description SummarybrbrustrongThe People Data and Process Analyst  Excellence will collect compile and analyze HR data and metrics and apply this data to make recommendations for all HR data related activities This role is responsible for regular data audits ensuring the integrity and accuracy of the data related to HR records transactions and processes This role is also responsible for Tier 2 issue resolution for all global HR platformsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongstrongJob DescriptionbrstrongulliPerforms Data AuditsliliTroubleshooting of process data reporting and transactional issues within the People TeamliliResolves tickets including organizational creation process rescinds data validation and reporting requests within specified Service Level Agreement liliSupports tactical light configuration within global platforms including table maintenance and calculated fieldsliliAnalyzes trends and makes recommendations to support data governance and integrityliliSupports MampA activities by preparing and loading where applicable EIB and other mass data loads liliSupports testing activities and provides opinions associated to data impacts for technical changes and releasesliliAligns data knowledge wit HR Centers of excellence to ensure data quality and translates data into consumable business languageliliProvides training and support to People teams as needed to ensure understanding of processes transactions reports and data outcomes liliPerforms other related duties as required or requestedbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulli3 years of relative experienceliliBachelors degree is preferred or equivalent experienceliliExperience in Workday JD Edwards People Experience Tool is preferredliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliStrong analytical and problemsolving skillsliliAn understanding of local state and federal laws involving employment HR and HR policiesliliProficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related softwareliliProficient with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS payroll and similar
